arts.ttl: Frank Lampard makes feelings clear after Coventry suffer play-off heartbreak at Sunderland
arts.sum: Frank Lampard watched on as his Coventry side conceded against Sunderland in the 120th minute to leave their play-off promotion hopes in tatters at the Stadium of Light

arts.ttl: Sunderland reach Championship play-off final as last-gasp Dan Ballard goal stuns Coventry
arts.sum: Black Cats to meet Sheffield United at Wembley as they seek a first return to the Premier League since 2017

arts.ttl: Ballard’s 122nd-minute goal shatters Coventry and puts Sunderland in playoff final
arts.athr: Louise Taylor at the Stadium of Light
arts.sum: When Régis Le Bris first took charge of Sunderland last summer the Frenchman was such an unknown quantity that it took a good couple of weeks before fellow guests in his hotel began realising who he was. Ten months later the lowest of low‑key managerial appointments is one game away from the Premier League after Dan Ballard’s headed goal from Enzo Le Fée’s corner at the very end of extra time sparked the most joyous of pitch invasions. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Dan Ballard stoops to conquer Coventry and send delirious Sunderland into play-off final
arts.sum: SUNDERLAND 1-1 COVENTRY (SUNDERLAND WIN 3-2 ON AGGREGATE): Ballard headed home a corner off the crossbar in the dying moments of extra-time to spark chaos at the Stadium of Light

arts.ttl: Dan Ballard’s last-gasp extra-time header sends Sunderland to Wembley
arts.sum: Ephron Mason-Clark had fired Coventry level with 14 minutes of normal time remaining.

arts.ttl: Sunderland vs Coventry City LIVE: Latest Championship updates from huge second-leg
arts.sum:
Follow live coverage as Sunderland face Coventry City in the Championship today.

An increasingly competitive second tier in English football remains an intense and exciting competition, with the prize of a place in the Premier League on offer at the end of the season.
